pullRequest.title: Mappings and Explanatory Javadoc for Chunk Update Changes
pullRequest.bodyText:
There were some changes to chunk update since 1.16 and this PR tries to:

Add some of the mappings related to it
Add explanatory Javadoc where possible to make it easier for other people poking through that code

beforeCommit.message: Mappings for changes to chunk update packets

afterCommit.message: Mappings for changes to chunk update packets

nodes.bodyText: retainOldLighting?
unpack(To)LocalX, so on
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -73,6 +75,34 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_4076 net/minecraft/util/math/ChunkSectionPos

 		ARG 0 center
 		ARG 1 radius
+	METHOD method_30551 getPackedLocalPosX (S)I

nodes.bodyText:

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -20,6 +20,13 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_3193 net/minecraft/server/world/ChunkHolder FIELD field_17210 playersWatchingChunkProvider Lnet/minecraft/class_3193$class_3897; FIELD field_19238 ticking Z FIELD field_19333 tickingFuture Ljava/util/concurrent/CompletableFuture; + FIELD field_25803 pendingBlockUpdates Z + COMMENT Indicates that {@link #blockUpdatesBySection} contains at least one entry. + FIELD field_25804 blockUpdatesBySection [Lit/unimi/dsi/fastutil/shorts/ShortSet; + COMMENT Contains the packed chunk-local positions that have been marked for update + COMMENT by {@link #markForBlockUpdate}, grouped by their chunk y-section. + COMMENT

+ COMMENT Entries for a section are null, if the section has no positions marked for update.
